title: How to write a flirtatious character - Quora

response.answer_text: A flirtation character must be given credible flirtatiousness, by using credible flirts. Here are five examples of credible flirts, which use may use in your next book, movie or play, if you credit “ssevdor” as your source: I love your dress—give it to me!Of all the women I know—you’re ONE of them!I really like our friendship—especially when we make out!It’s said that nothing lasts forever—will you be my nothing?I love you forever—and the duration of eternity is a long time!
